As a publicly held company, Sears Holdings Corporation is one of the largest retailers in the United States. The company operates more than 3,500 full-line and specialty retail stores in the U.S. and Canada. Its stores offer tools, electronic appliances, and lawn and garden equipment. The company s stores sell apparel under the Lands' End, Jaclyn Smith, Apostrophe, Covington and Joe Boxer brands. Sears Holdings Corporation s stores also provide automotive and office products and baby, beauty, personal and health care items. Its stores  additional products include jewelry, shoes, accessories, gifts, books, toys and fitness equipment. The company s stores respond to over 12 million home service calls annually. Its stores offer reward programs, gift certificates, and delivery, shipping and online shopping services. Sears Holdings Corporation has received the Distinguished Service Award from the Military Officers Association of America. The company supports several community-based organizations, such as Rebuilding Together and the National Military Family Association. Sears Holdings Corporation operates through its subsidiaries, Kmart Corporation and Sears, Roebuck and Company.
